title: Using Relics
how_relics_work: Relics are **passive buffs** that automatically enhance your tower's abilities once unlocked. Unlike other game systems, relics require no active management or configuration.
automatic_activation: No need to equip, activate, or configure relics
All unlocked relics provide their bonuses simultaneously
Relics cannot be turned off or disabled

additive_bonuses.description: Similar relics stack additively with each other
additive_bonuses.example: Multiple "Tower Damage" relics add their percentages together

multiplicative_bonuses.description: Different bonus types multiply with each other
multiplicative_bonuses.example: Tower Damage relics multiply with other damage bonuses
multiplicative_bonuses.formula: Final Value = Base Value × (1 + Relic Bonus) × (1 + Other Bonuses)

permanent_benefits: Bonuses persist across all game modes and runs
No resource cost to maintain relic bonuses
Relics enhance all aspects of tower performance

total_impact.description: When all relics are unlocked, they provide massive stat improvements
total_impact.note: This makes relics one of the most powerful progression systems in the game, providing permanent advantages that compound with other game systems.
